title: Measurement Plans
subtitle: Create and manage measurement plans for your projects
descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of the measurement plan
noPlansDescription: Create your first measurement plan to organize and track your software measurement activities
qualityDescription: Focus on quality metrics and defect tracking
performanceDescription: Track project delivery and timeline metrics
organizationRequiredDescription: You need to create or join an organization to create measurement plans and manage planning activities

gqm.createPlanFirst: Create a plan first to start defining goals, questions, and metrics

phaseDescriptions.planning: Define business and software goals aligned with strategic objectives
phaseDescriptions.definition: Apply GQM structure to derive key questions and define metrics
phaseDescriptions.data_collection: Establish data collection procedures and gather measurements
phaseDescriptions.interpretation: Analyze data and interpret findings in context of original goals
phaseDescriptions.completed: Review results, take action, and iterate on the measurement plan

stepDescriptions.defineGoals: Identify what you want to achieve with measurement and align goals with strategic objectives
stepDescriptions.applyGQM: Use the GQM template to structure your goals with purpose, quality focus, viewpoint, and context
stepDescriptions.deriveQuestions: Translate each goal into key questions that explore the goal's intent and guide measurements
stepDescriptions.defineMetrics: Define what to measure to answer each question, including quantitative and qualitative metrics
stepDescriptions.establishCollection: Determine tools, frequency, and responsibility for data collection procedures
stepDescriptions.analyzeData: Use collected metrics to answer defined questions and interpret findings
stepDescriptions.takeAction: Present results, compare to baselines, and recommend actions based on analysis
stepDescriptions.reviewIterate: Refine goals, questions, or metrics as needed and add new goals as projects evolve

workflow.title: Measurement Plan Workflow
workflow.subtitle: Create your measurement plan by following these guided steps
workflow.step1Description: Set the foundation for your measurement plan with basic information
workflow.step2Description: Define measurement goals using the Goal-Question-Metric approach
workflow.step3Description: Create questions that will guide your measurement activities
workflow.step4Description: Specify the metrics that will answer your questions
workflow.step5Description: Review and finalize your measurement plan
